Seven Haiku About First Hackathon Experience

Jan 25, 2015

Tweet

HAIKU 1

The Developer
Earns his living
By clicking

HAIKU 2

That's not water
Nope, It's bad coffee
Says the long-haired guy

HAIKU 3

30 hours
16 teams
1 room

HAIKU 4

$injection error
Decaying bolts of sunlight caress my corneas
I want to climb a big tree

HAIKU 5

Understand? says Mike
I nod and
Understand, that I don't understand

HAIKU 6

One-forty-three in the morning
Tequila bottle and laptop
I'm learning things

HAIKU 7

Google watches and vineyard vines ties
I stuff my pack
free sandwiches

Crafted with ♥ in the ATX
